suggestedTasks.title: Add template variables/placeholders system
suggestedTasks.description: Allow templates to define placeholder variables like {command-name}, {description} that get replaced during application
suggestedTasks.reason: The applyTemplate function exists but could be enhanced with more placeholder support

suggestedTasks.title: Add custom user templates
suggestedTasks.description: Allow users to save their own command templates to ~/.config/jat/templates/
suggestedTasks.reason: Current templates are hardcoded; power users may want to define their own

patterns: Template picker uses two-step wizard pattern: showTemplateStep state controls which view is shown
Templates include frontmatter defaults that populate form fields on selection
gotchas: Template content uses escaped backticks in template strings - be careful with markdown code blocks
